page.title: 13Langtoft Methodist Chapel
page.content: Langtoft{Methodist Chapel}is situated on Back Street.It was built in 1874 to replace the original Methodist Chapel of St.Mary which is now used as rooms for activities associated with the Chapel such as the Sunday School and the Darby and Joan Club. The original Chapel was first licenced in 1808. The Minister is the Rev. Brian Lewis, who lives in Bridlington. The Sunday School is led by Mrs. Ann Bailey and with help from other parents.There is an average attendance of twelve children aged from three to nine years,who are taught in two classes. There is also a{Primitive Methodists {Chapel}in the village.It is situated on Cottam Lane.It was built in 1839 and was used for worship until 1950.It is now a private house.
